name: mcp-debug-hub
description: VS code extension debug server with MCP API

commands.title: MCP Debug Hub: Get Server URL

mcpDebugHub.ssePort.description: Port number for the MCP SSE (Server-Sent Events) server. Used by AI clients like Cursor, Continue, and Cline to connect for debugging.

mcpDebugHub.sseHost.description: Host address where the MCP SSE server will listen. Use 'localhost' for local connections or '0.0.0.0' to allow remote connections.

mcpDebugHub.autostart.description: Automatically start the MCP server when VS Code opens. When disabled, use 'MCP Debug Hub: Start Server' command to start manually.

mcpDebugHub.logLevel.description: Logging verbosity level. 'debug' shows all messages, 'error' shows only errors. View logs in the 'MCP Debug Hub' output channel.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.vsix: npm run package && npx shx mkdir -p dist && npx vsce package --out dist/mcp-debug-hub.vsix
